alert_delete_item_message: Are you sure you want delete this item? It will be also remove from your favorties.
alert_delete_list_message: Are you sure you want to clear this list? All your items will be delete. Your favorites will be deleted too.
about_text_1: QrCode Manager is a completely free app, no ads, no tracking. If you like the app, please donate to encourage me to improve it. You can also rate this app with 5 five stars on PlayStore
alert_delete_favorites_message: Are you sure you want to clear your favorties list?
mode_anonyme_banner_message: No history mode activated. No QrCode will be saved in the history.
permission_camera_message: We need your permission to use the camera.
settings_anonym_mode_description: Codes will not be stored in the app
settings_history_size_description: Maximum elements in the history (100 max.)
settings_accent_color_description: Choose an accent color for the app
settings_open_url_auto_description: When an url is detected, the browser will be opened
